title: Department of Biotechnology
bannerCon: The University of Wyoming welcomes students to experience a one-of-a-kind education in the heart of the Mountain West.

items.subTitle: Overview
items.contents: The Department of Science and Humanities provides Engineering students with a well-rounded educational experience and strives to integrate the students’ concentration in Science and Humanities with their core Engineering subjects and to insure prerequisites are met within their technical discipline. The study of Science and Humanities is a capstone experience bringing together the knowledge and insights that students need to acquire throughout their engineering curricula.

faculty.qualification: BSc, MSc, MBA(IB), M.Phil, DOA, DCP

faculty.name: Mrs. C. J. Angelin Sagaya Rani

content.title: Chemistry lab
content.content: The students gain knowledge and skills regarding important concepts and principles of chemistry which is relevant to the context and practical applications in Engineering and Technology

content.title: Physics lab
content.content: Engineering Physics program will apply their strong problem solving skills as physicists along with an understanding of the approach, methods, and requirements of engineering and engineering design for a successful career in advancing technology. Its engineering science and design components prepare students to work as professional engineers. Engineering Physics program will use their strong skills in problem solving, research experience and knowledge in physics and engineering as successful graduate students and researchers in highly ranked graduate programs.

content.title: English lab
content.content: A well equipped language laboratory with 61 systems and a full time programmer exists to provide access to each and every student with systems so as to enhance the employability skills of the students by importing both verbal and non verbal skills.

items.title: Orientation/Induction Programme
content: Department of Science and Humanities organised Orientation Day on 07.10.2020 with the resource person Mr. Arul Senniappan, Fouder CEO Business Transformation Expert, Quadruple Consulting, Coimbatore and Induction Programme from October 8, 2020 to October 26, 2020.

Department of Science and Humanities organised Orientation Day on 15.07.2019 with the resource person Dr. K. Kumarasamy, Former Director of Collegiate Education, Government of Tamilnadu and Induction Programme from July 16, 2019 to August 02, 2019.
Department of Science and Humanities organised Fresh Budding Engineers Orientation Programme on 01.08.2018and Induction Programme from August 02, 2018- August 15, 2018.
Department of Science and Humanities organised Orientation Programme on August 07, 2017 with the resource person Mr. S.R.Vasanth, CEO, Vertace Consultants.
Department of Science and Humanities organised Orientation programme on July 20, 2016 with the Chief Guest of Dr. R. Vasantha Kumar, President, Karpagam Group of
Department of Science and Humanities organised Orientation programme on 22, 2015 with the Chief Guest of Dr. R. Vasantha Kumar, President, Karpagam Group of

Department of Science and Humanities organised Orientation programme on teaching and Learning on August 22, 2015 with the resource person Mr. P. Chandrasekar, District Differently Abled Welfare Officer, Coimbatore.

items.title: Association Inaugural
content: Department of Science and Humanities organised Association Inauguration on August 30, 2019 with the chief guest Smt. K. Chithralekha, Director, All India Radio, Coimbatore.
Department of Science and Humanities organised Association Inauguration on September 12, 2018 with the chief guest MJF Lion Ganga Devi Bheeman, President, Lions Club of Coimbatore.
Department of Science and Humanities organised Association Inauguration on August 18, 2017 with the chief guest NeethuHariraj, Managing Partner, Coir-on Products, Pollachi.
Department of Science and Humanities organised Association Inauguration on August 12, 2016 with the resource person Mrs. Umamaheswari, Pattimandram Speaker LIC of India.

items.title: Science Day
content: Department of Science and Humanities organised Science Day 2019 on February 15, 2019 with the chief guest Dr. K. Srinivansan, Professor and Head, Department of Physics, Bharathiar University.
Department of Science and Humanities organised Science Day on February 28, 2018 with the resource person Dr.VS. Elmurugan, Dean Academics, KG Group of Institutions, Coimbatore.
Department of Science and Humanities organised Science Day 2017 on February 28, 2017 on the Theme Science and Technology for specially abled persons the chief guest Dr Sadasivam Former Director TNAU.
Department of Science and Humanities organised Science Day on February 26, 2015with the resource person Dr. P.V. Mohanram, Principal, PSG Institute of Technology and Applied Research, Coimbatore.
